SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics)

summary: This tutorial covers HTML Graphics concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use HTML Graphics effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of HTML Graphics and how to apply it in your projects.
